metadata.name: Kobe in 1998 - The Focus
metadata.description:
In 1998, Kobe was selected by the Rolling Stones magazine as “Teenager of the Year”. 
Kobe had yet to win his first NBA Championship. Everyone knew of his competitive spirit. He was always evolving and studying the game. In this animation, we give insight into the thoughts that may have permeated his psyche. 

This animation provides a foreshadowing of the 2000 NBA Title in which Kobe wins his first Career NBA Championship with the Los Angeles Lakers. 
 
The points of focus:

-	An animated Kobe in 1998 inspired by the iconic Rolling Stones photo.

-	We give life to Kobe by making him breathe (Look at Chest Area)

-	The Lakers 2000 NBA Championship Ring appears from the Future.

-	Then as quickly as the Ring appears, it disappears as it is not yet his Reality.


“Any goal that comes into Reality must first be manifested in the mind”

8% of the proceeds will be donated to the Mamba Foundation.

“May the Timeline be with you…”

Video Details: 3840 x 2160 (4K Resolution)
